general.title: General Settings
general.description: Language, file paths, and basic configuration

defaultPath.label: Default File Path
defaultPath.description: Default directory for saving new projects

llm.title: LLM Configuration
llm.description: Set API endpoint, model, and call parameters

provider.label: Provider
provider.description: Choosing a provider pre-fills sensible defaults

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.description: Stored locally only and never uploaded

maxToolRounds.label: Max Tool Rounds
maxToolRounds.description: Limit consecutive tool calls per conversation

deepseek.label: DeepSeek
deepseek.description: Official DeepSeek API with chat and reasoning models

openai-reasoning.label: OpenAI Reasoning
openai-reasoning.description: Dedicated entry for reasoning models like o3

agent.title: Agent Settings
agent.description: Configure the AI agent's behavior and capabilities. These settings apply globally across all models.

systemPrompt.label: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: The default instructions given to the AI agent. This can be overridden per conversation.
systemPrompt.resetConfirm: This will discard your current edits. Confirm reset to default system prompt?

agent.futureFeatures: Future releases will include additional agent configuration options such as thinking mode toggles, tool call strategies, and more.

emptyState.title: No providers configured
emptyState.description: Add a provider to get started

modelsList.title: Models
modelsList.emptyWithAction: This provider has no models yet. Click Add Model to create one.

name.label: Provider Name
name.description: A friendly name for this provider
name.minLength: Provider name must be at least {min} characters
name.maxLength: Provider name must be at most {max} characters

options.deepseekNative: DeepSeek native API with reasoning support

apiUrl.label: API URL
apiUrl.description: The base URL for the API. Should include /v1 path.
apiUrl.invalidProtocol: URL must use HTTP or HTTPS

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.description: Optional. Leave blank to use without authentication.
apiKey.minLength: API Key must be at least {min} characters

modelName.label: Model Name
modelName.description: The actual model ID used in requests (required)

displayName.label: Display Name
displayName.description: A friendly name for UI display, does not affect requests

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls output randomness, higher values increase creativity

maxToolRounds.label: Max Tool Rounds
maxToolRounds.description: Maximum number of tool call rounds per conversation
maxToolRounds.invalid: Max tool rounds must be an integer
maxToolRounds.outOfRange: Please enter a value between 1 and 999

capabilities.title: Model Capabilities
capabilities.description: Mark whether the model supports thinking/vision abilities, affects tool call strategy

thinking.label: Supports Thinking
thinking.description: For reasoning models like o1 / o3 / deepseek-reasoner

vision.label: Supports Vision
vision.description: Can parse image/screenshot inputs, e.g., gpt-4o

enableToolsInThinking.label: Enable Tools in Thinking
enableToolsInThinking.description: Some reasoning models can invoke tools during thinking phase

test.networkError: Network error. Please check your URL.

save.modelError: Failed to save model, please try again

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will also delete all associated models.
delete.successNoActiveModel: Provider "{name}" deleted. No active model available. Please configure a model.

deleteModel.title: Delete Model
deleteModel.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

systemPrompt.label: System Prompt
systemPrompt.title: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Define global behavior and guardrails for the AI editor

connectionTest.title: Test Result
connectionTest.description: Send a health check to verify your API configuration

version.title: Version Management Settings
version.description: Configure automatic version strategies for AI edits

autoVersionOnAIEdit.label: Auto version for AI edits
autoVersionOnAIEdit.description: Create a sub-version snapshot before AI bulk edits or XML overwrite

errors.outOfRange: Value is out of allowed range

file.title: File Path Settings
file.description: Set the default save location for DrawIO files

defaultPath.label: Default startup path
defaultPath.note: This path is preferred when saving files and only works in Electron
